net.sf.sprockets.view

Class ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.view.ViewHolder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextViewHolder

    public abstract class ViewHolder
extends Object
    Base class for the View Holder pattern. Implementations must be public.

    Sample implementation: 

     public class SomeHolder extends ViewHolder {
     @InjectView(R.id.someView)
     View someView;

     @Override
     protected SomeHolder newInstance() {
         return new SomeHolder();
     }
 }

    Sample usage: 

    SomeHolder holder = ViewHolder.get(view, SomeHolder.class);

      Get a ViewHolder for the View that is injected and tagged on the View.
